\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 18613}

\subsection*{Temporary Cure of My Headaches}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Triptamine}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 20 mg & smoked & DMT & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 3.0 g & oral & Mushrooms & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have been experiencing medium to intense headaches for about 1 1/2 years as of now (11/02).  I most often notice the headaches when reading, watching a movie, or working on the computer.  When they are at their strongest point, I cannot read or look at something any longer.  It seems as though there is tremendous pressure in my eyes or like my eye muscles are completely sore and tired.  I have been to doctors numerous times, but they cannot find the problem.  



Recently, I have found complete relief from these headaches by using psilocybin.  Some times the relief lasts several days - maybe up to a week.  I also found that DMT also works at low dosages (10-30mg).  I wonder\ldots Has anyone else found relief in these substances?  Does anyone use these or other medications on a regular basis to control headaches?



Triptamine

\end{document}
